short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds likes and dislikes bar in Youtube Home Page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring back the like and dislike counts on YouTube with the Likes&DislikesInHome Chrome extension! This user-friendly extension revives a much-missed feature, allowing you to see the like and dislike counts directly on video thumbnails on the YouTube homepage.

Features:

Real-Time Like and Dislike Counts: View up-to-date like and dislike counts on YouTube video thumbnails, offering a quick insight into the video's reception.
Automatic Updates: The extension processes new thumbnails loaded on the page (such as through scrolling) every second, ensuring you always see the latest data.
Seamless Integration: The like-dislike bar is neatly integrated into the YouTube thumbnail, maintaining the site's look and feel.
Error Handling: In case of any issues, such as network errors or missing video IDs, the extension responsibly logs errors for troubleshooting without interrupting your browsing experience.
How it Works:
Likes&DislikesInHome uses the 'returnyoutubedislikeapi.com' API to fetch like and dislike counts for YouTube videos. It dynamically creates and appends a visual like-dislike bar to each video thumbnail on the YouTube homepage. This bar represents the ratio of likes to dislikes, giving you a quick overview of the video's popularity.

Easy to Use:
Simply install the extension, and it starts working immediately. No additional setup or configuration is needed.

Privacy and Performance:
We respect your privacy. Likes&DislikesInHome does not collect personal data. It's also optimized for minimal impact on your browsing speed.

Support and Feedback:
For support or to provide feedback, please contact [Support Contact Information].

Enhance your YouTube experience with Likes&DislikesInHome and join our community of users who enjoy a more informative and engaging browsing experience. Try it now!

-----------------------------------------------------------
This app uses Return Youtube Dislike API: returnyoutubedislike.com
Any slowness when showing the bar below the thumbnails, is because you are being rate limited by the api. Details:

Rate Limiting: There are per client rate limits in place of 100 per minute and 10,000 per day. This will return a 429 status code indicating that your application should back off
